alert.note: Alert for Murray; Nobles (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 5:35PM CDT until May 11 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN JACKSON...NORTHEASTERN NOBLES...SOUTHEASTERN MURRAY AND COTTONWOOD COUNTIES... At 535 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Heron Lake, or 13 miles west of Windom, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Storden around 545 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Windom, Kilen Woods State Park, Bergen, Jeffers and Bingham Lake. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southwestern Minnesota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
